The fighting officially ends at 11:00 a.m., (the eleventh hour in the eleventh month on the eleventh day) and this is annually honoured with a two-minute silence. This storm also brings blizzard conditions to the Appalachian Mountains and Ohio Valley, becoming one of the worst storms of all time. 353 people die in the event.", "1952 \u2013 Agatha Christie's murder-mystery play The Mousetrap opens at the Ambassadors Theatre in London later becoming the longest continuously-running play in history.", "1958 \u2013 French Sudan gains autonomy as a self-governing member of the French Community.", "1960 \u2013 The Mirabal sisters of the Dominican Republic are assassinated.", "1963 \u2013 President John F.
